headline.main: GLASS ADVOCATES NEUTRALITY LAW BE KILLED IN FULL; Senator Will Work to Repeal 'Craven' Act and 'Make This a Nation of Americans' PEPPER TO MOVE FOR THIS Wheeler 'Welcomes' It, Plans War-Test Rider -- Ship Arms Foes Concede Passage GLASS FOR ENDING NEUTRALITY LAW

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 18 -- Senator Glass of Virginia and Senator Pepper of Florida called for outright repeal of the Neutrality Act today.
abstract: repeal urged by Pepper and Glass; war declaration rider planned by Wheeler; Sen com ship arming opponents list tentative witnesses; isolationists concede defeat
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 18 -- Senator Glass of Virginia and Senator Pepper of Florida called for outright repeal of the Neutrality Act today....

byline.original: By JAMES B. RESTONSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
